channel.title: TGRoss
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGRoss, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Put the “Pedal to the Metal” in this Market
item.description: The government shutdown hasn’t hit the markets yet, but it’s about to stir things up. With key economic data, like job numbers, delayed indefinitely, ...

item.title: Smart Money Actually Underweight US Stocks?
item.description: Hey, Ross here. The S&P 500 just notched another all-time high—government shutdown or not—and I’m not calling “top.” Today’s chart, Goldman Sachs’ U.S...

item.title: Will the Shutdown End the Market Rally?
item.description: Hey, Ross here. Q4 just kicked off—and ran straight into a government shutdown. Will it derail the rally? History says no: shutdowns rarely dent stock...
